root.name: Lumi
root.description: Lumi is a puzzle-platformer developped by Kydos Studios, french studio that had made Xbox Live indie game Soul. The game puts you in charge of Lumi, a small creature that must bring back light to a dark world. The game is set in 2D with puzzles based on physiques and platforming. The game is available for 400 MS. Lumi won the 2010 Dream Build Play contest which earned Kydos a 400 000$ cash prize.
